actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain civil supersonic aircraft from landing at, or taking off from, Dulles International Airport or Washington National Airport.

summary.text: Prohibits civil supersonic aircraft which exceed presently permited noise levels from landing at, or taking off from, Dulles International Airport or Washington National Airport.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain civil supersonic aircraft from landing at, or taking off from, Dulles International Airport or Washington National Airport.
